com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.comb

Class SproutsTooltip

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.comb.SproutsTooltip
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SproutsGameState

    public final class SproutsTooltip
extends Object
implements SproutsGameState
    This graph represents a visual UI tooltip that highlights the sprouts in which the current move can end.

    This graph is comprised of the sprouts that are on the boundary of a face in which the current move can end.

    edges() returns an empty set.

      • edges

        public Set<SproutsEdge> edges()
        Returns an empty set.

        Sprouts tooltip has no edges. It is only comprised of sprouts.

        Specified by:

        Returns:

        Parameters:
        renderer - the renderer to render with
        thickness - the radius of vertices
        circleSegmentCount - the number of segments for the circles drawn
        displayCobweb - this argument has no effect on the rendering of this graph
